Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 1: Scaffold Expo project with navigation and models

Set up Expo \(SDK 54\) with TypeScript and Expo Router file-based routing.
Includes 4-tab layout \(Weekly Plan, Quadrant, Calendar, Settings\),
modal screens for goal/role/event CRUD, TypeScript models matching the
Google Sheets schema, theme constants, and date/uuid utilities.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
